issue.title: [R] Write vignette for R package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3943](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3943). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
a vignette similar to https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/index.html

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3943?focusedCommentId=16715484) by Greg Botwin (gbotwin):*
`[~romainfrancois]` I am a moderate R coder looking for ways to contribute to the arrow project. I do not have C++ knowledge so I was thinking I might be able to best contribute contribute through assisting with documentation or vignettes. Can you please let me know if you this is a reasonable place to start or where you and others working on R/Arrow might need some additional help. 

 

Thanks,

Greg

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3943?focusedCommentId=16924648) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This is being done in ARROW-5505.
